Really? Because to me it just seems like a cheap way to establish a quick emotional responses out of people.  No different than an artist who draws a little girl with her head cut off. Are there interesting ways of telling such a story? Sure. But most of them lets be real are not interesting. Show a girl in love and devoted to her guy or even a mutual crush. Either through blackmail or painfully unrealistic "seduction" a girl is fucked by another man in front of her horrified husband(or he'll receive "the text" with either a picture/video of his girl being fucked or words that confirm it).  And that's the only "interesting" thing about the whole damn story. After that she'll just succumb to the power of the other man's amazing dick and throw away her pride/dignity to be his shaft sock.  There I just described 90% of the NTR you'll ever find. It's not that I'm devastated seeing this or putting myself in the shoes of some simp who can't just walk away or cries and jacks off in his sock.
